fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each day, you may Bless a player to grant them Roleblock, Redirect, and Control immunity for the following night.
 - You may Bless yourself.
 - Your target will not be notified.
- Each night, you may Curse a player, and Control them into targeting another player with their night action.
 - If Controlling fails, you will Redirect them instead.
 - If Redirecting fails, you will Roleblock them instead.
 - If Roleblocking fails, you will learn their true role instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role is 100 times more rare than the average role.
- Astral, Conversion Immune
- You have single-use Invincible Defense.
 - If it blocks an attack, the attacker learns your true role.
